fw.name: CATMatInterfaces
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

method.name: GetType
method.abstract: Returns the analysis type (Ex: MATERIAL_ORTHOTROPIC, MATERIAL_ISOTROPIC).

method.name: GetValue
method.abstract: Returns an analysis value of the material.

method.name: PutValue
method.abstract: Sets an analysis value of the material.

method.name: CopyRenderingDataFrom
method.abstract: Copy rendering data from a material to the current material.

method.name: CreateAnalysisData
method.abstract: Create a default analysis material on the current material.

method.name: CreateRenderingData
method.abstract: Create a default rendering material on the current material.

method.name: ExistAnalysisData
method.abstract: Returns true if a analysis material exists on the current material.

method.name: ExistRenderingData
method.abstract: Returns true if a rendering material exists on the current material.

method.name: GetIcon
method.abstract: Write the icon of a material to disc.

method.name: PutIcon
method.abstract: Read the icon of a material from JPEG file.

method.name: AnalysisMaterial
method.abstract: Returns the analysis material object from the current material.

method.name: RenderingMaterial
method.abstract: Returns the rendering material object from the current material.

class.name: MaterialDocument
class.abstract: Represents the Document object for materials.

method.name: Families
method.abstract: Returns the Family collection object from the current material document.

class.name: MaterialFamilies
class.abstract: A collection of all the MaterialFamily objects.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Adds a new material family to the MaterialFamilies collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a material family from its index in the MaterialFamilies collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a material family from the MaterialFamilies collection.

method.name: Materials
method.abstract: Returns the material collection object from the current material family.

class.name: MaterialManager
class.abstract: Interface to manage material manager object.

method.name: ApplyMaterialOnBody
method.abstract: Apply a Material on a Body.

method.name: ApplyMaterialOnHybridBody
method.abstract: Apply a Material on a Hybrid Body.

method.name: ApplyMaterialOnPart
method.abstract: Apply a Material on a Part.

method.name: ApplyMaterialOnProduct
method.abstract: Apply a Material on a Product.

method.name: ApplyMaterialOnUserMaterial
method.abstract: Apply a Material on a User Material (Analysis entity).

method.name: GetMaterialOnBody
method.abstract: Get a Material on a Body.

method.name: GetMaterialOnHybridBody
method.abstract: Get a Material on a Hybrid Body.

method.name: GetMaterialOnPart
method.abstract: Get a Material on a Part.

method.name: GetMaterialOnProduct
method.abstract: Get a Material on a Product.

method.name: GetMaterialOnUserMaterial
method.abstract: Get a Material on a User Material (Analysis entity).

method.name: ReplaceMaterialLinks
method.abstract: In current session, replace all links towards a material 1 with a link towards an other material 2.

class.name: Materials
class.abstract: A collection of all the Material objects.

method.name: Add
method.abstract: Adds a new material to the material collection.

method.name: Item
method.abstract: Returns a material from its index in the Material collection.

method.name: Remove
method.abstract: Removes a material from the materials collection.

method.name: SortedItem
method.abstract: Returns a material from its index in the sorted Material collection.

method.name: ApplicationMode
method.abstract: Returns the application mode of the material.

method.name: InheritanceMode
method.abstract: Returns or sets the inheritance mode of an applied material.

method.name: Material
method.abstract: Returns the material object from the current positioned material.
